text: Cheers Jez. Of course, I’m keeping all my numberblock stuff online but picking and choosing some of the bits I liked from other projects I’ve done. I was wondering what your take is on personal projects within a portfolio? Whether it’s taking a scene from a book or audio from something else and reboarding it. I don’t really see much of it online but as someone who’s only done a hand full of projects how does someone show their skill or capabilities?
